heading: Who Am I?
description: Senior UI Developer with {years} of experience crafting high-performance web applications and scalable e-commerce platforms. Specialized in transforming complex business requirements into intuitive, responsive user interfaces that drive engagement and revenue growth.

Full-stack proficiency across modern technologies including React, Angular, Node.js, and Python, complemented by expertise in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript ES6+. Successfully architected and delivered 10+ enterprise-grade applications, including robust authentication systems, reusable component libraries, and order management solutions serving thousands of users daily.

Proven track record in leading technical implementations, optimizing application performance, and establishing development best practices. Passionate about creating seamless user experiences through clean code, accessibility standards, and innovative problem-solving.

services.title: Dynamic
services.description: Websites don't have to be static

services.title: Responsive
services.description: Always work on any device, big or small
